entry.title: Workflow Engines Up and Running
entry.summary:
Description

Join us for an introduction hands on tutorial of Python based workflow engines.

You will get to create, run and monitor a real time workflow job with two Python based popular workflow engines: Airflow and Luigi. Developers may have some long running batch jobs and may be using one of the tools we will cover or might be using a different engine, and would like a more in depth hands-on experience learning these tools.

entry.title: Dai dati alla visualizzazione: la mia prima data pipeline
entry.summary:
Description

Costruire una data pipeline non deve essere per forza complicato. Nel talk vedremo come si pu√≤ realizzare una semplice data pipeline usando Luigi per consumare dati da una API e prepararli per fare esplorazione e visualizzazione con Superset (AKA Caravel).

entry.title: Luigi - Big data plumbing library
entry.summary:
Description

Luigi is workflow orchestration framework library developed by Spotify and being used extensively at Oracle. In this talk I will cover key design aspects of Luigi, the way we use it and what makes it so special
